casebody.data:
Henry S. HASTINGS, as Receiver of the Pittsburgh, Shawmut & Northern Railroad Company, Plaintiff in Error, v. Ralph PIZZANO, Defendant in Error. (Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. January 21, 1924.) No. 177. Dickson & Dickson, of Wellsville, N. Y., for plaintiff in error. Hamilton Ward, of Buffalo, N. Y. (William J. Elynn, of Buffalo, N. Y., of counsel),, for defendant in error.

Before ROGERS, HOUGH, and MAYER, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Judgment affirmed.
